Channel 40 (HD) | adsl serv 15 = '''Hitron Limted''' '''Papua New Guinea''' | adsl chan 15 = Channel 31 }} '''Disney Junior''' in [[Asia]] is a 24-hour commercial-free television channel that was launch on July 11, 2011, replaced [[Playhouse Disney Asia]] since January 1 1994 .The [[Television program|programs]] are similar to the Disney Junior in the [[United States|United States of America]]. However the channel may also carry some non-Disney programming like ''[[Clifford the Big Red Dog]]'', ''[[Pororo the Little Penguin]]'', ''[[Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs]]'', ''Dibo the Gift Dragon'', etc. Programming on the channel is uninterrupted by commercials. Disney Junior is available in the [[Singapore]], [[Indonesia]], [[South Korea]], [[Malaysia]], [[Hong Kong]], [[Thailand]], [[Brunei]], [[Papua New Guinea]], [[Vietnam]], and [[Philippines]]. Disney Junior available as a block on Disney Channel in [[Disney Channel Taiwan|Taiwan]], [[Disney Channel Hong Kong|Hong Kong]], [[Disney Channel Korea|South Korea]] and as a block on TV5 [[Philippines]]. == Feeds == Disney Junior Asia is divided in 4 feeds: *''Disney Junior SE Asia'': available in Asia. *''Disney Junior South Korea'': available in South Korea. *''Disney Junior Taiwan'': available in Taiwan as a block of Disney Channel. *''Disney Junior Japan'': available in Japan as a block of Disney Channel. == Shows == {{main|List of programs broadcast by Disney Junior}}
